name: meteorite
effect: RSE: May be traded to Professor Cozmo for tm27. FRLG: A meteorite to be delivered to Lostelle’s father.
short_effect: FL: Deliver to Lostelle’s father. RSE: Trade to Professor Cozmo for TM27 (Return).

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A meteorite found at METEOR FALLS.
flavor_text.emerald: A meteorite found at METEOR FALLS.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A meteorite that fell from space onto MT. MOON long ago. It is very lumpy and hard.
